column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Finally got a chance to stop into the famous Cafe Ba Ba Reeba and I was impressed! The food was tasty and very reasonably priced
column2: the wine was also inexpensive for the taste. I love how the menu is broken out by veggie options
column5: a pescatarian to see what my options are without any grey area. Our server Ryan was super helpful and friendly as well. Also
column6: I want to give a shout out to whoever makes the bread because it was delicious; fresh
column8: and soft. We will be back in the near future for our next Tapas fix.
